name: cellaree
description: App for managing your wine and whisky cellar

scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.build: npm run clean && cd server && npm run build && cd ../client && npm run build
scripts.clean: cd server && npm run clean && cd ../client && npm run clean

author: cablej02
